alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 24 at 9:47PM EDT until March 26 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 2 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected before 2 PM, shifting southwest with gusts up to 60 mph after 2 PM. * WHERE...Northern Erie County. * WHEN...From 8 AM Saturday to 2 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southerly winds will be strong with gusts up to 55 mph possible before 2 PM. However, the strongest winds prompting the upgrade to a warning are expected out of the southwest behind a cold front moving through after 2 PM.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
